Job Description: Job title:  Lead / Sr. Front End Years of experience: 2-6 YearsLocation: Powai (Mumbai)Job description:We are looking for a Lead/ Sr.Front end web developer passionate towards building rich web applications. We are looking for self-driven individuals who love to find innovative solutions and can perform under pressure. An eye for detail and being proud of produced code are the must have attributes for this job.ResponsibilitiesYou will be responsible for converting Product team requirements to modular, testable and efficient code.You will also be required to cater to NFRs related to security and performance.SkillsAt least 2 years of experience in working on ReactJS/Redux/AngularGood knowledge of responsive framework MaterializeCSS along with exposure of HTML5, JAVA Script and CSS3 is required.Experience of building/deploying applications on AWS is a definite advantage.Good understanding on architectural patterns (e.g. MVC) is required.Good communication and analytical skills are the basic needs for this role.An urge to create awesome applications that people will enjoy using is a must.Qualification:Engineering graduates from Tier I or II institutes or worked with top product based organizationsB.E/ B.Tech/ MCA/ ME/ M.Tech
